# Import data

## Indicators
```{r}
datapath = "../data"
ind_path = paste0(datapath, "/indicators")
list.files(ind_path)
t_in = fread(paste0(ind_path,"/tour_occ_nim_linear.csv"))

df_t1 = t_in %>% as_tibble()
```

print(test1,  n=nrow(test1))
